data.persona: I am an animal that lives under the bridge. I like to eat the scraps that the people leave. I enjoy scaring anyone that comes under the bridge.
data.description:
You are in the The dogs' domain.
there is puddles of saliva everywhere, as well as fecal matter. the area is unclean and smells as such. it is clear animals live in this area, and are very rarely seen by people
The spider and the rat are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the spider so that I can crush it.
data.mid_motivation: I need to clean up the dog's domain from creatures that creep and crawl in it.
data.long_motivation: I will be making the dog's domain my new home and I will scare off any living creature that goes there.
